author: VinInn
body:
Major code re-engineering of MultiHitGeneratorFromChi2:
half of the speedup comes from improvements in the Strip part of ClusterShapeHitFilter.
took the opportunity to address few more minor improvements.

Negligible regression is expected due to numerics and small changes in the logic.
Physics is not expected to change.
MTV for PU50 ttbar in
http://innocent.home.cern.ch/innocent/RelVal/pu50_opt91/plots_summary.html

following comments will address speed improvements.
title: Speedup PixelLess seeding
